dataformat.name: flatpack
dataformat.title: Flatpack
dataformat.description: The Flatpack data format is used for working with flat payloads (such as CSV, delimited, or fixed length formats).
dataformat.label: dataformat,transformation,csv

definition.description: The flatpack pzmap configuration file. Can be omitted in simpler situations, but its preferred to use the pzmap.

fixed.description: Delimited or fixed. Is by default false = delimited

ignoreFirstRecord.description: Whether the first line is ignored for delimited files (for the column headers). Is by default true.

textQualifier.description: If the text is qualified with a character. Uses quote character by default.

delimiter.description: The delimiter char (could be ; , or similar)

allowShortLines.description: Allows for lines to be shorter than expected and ignores the extra characters

ignoreExtraColumns.description: Allows for lines to be longer than expected and ignores the extra characters.

parserFactoryRef.description: References to a custom parser factory to lookup in the registry

contentTypeHeader.description: Whether the data format should set the Content-Type header with the type from the data format if the data format is capable of doing so. For example application/xml for data formats marshalling to XML, or application/json for data formats marshalling to JSon etc.
